title: Combat milestones

properties.name: description
properties.value: This article contains various milestones of combat skills relevant for accounts engaging in  player-versus-player activites.

content:
This article contains various milestones of combat skills relevant for accounts engaging in player-versus-player activites.

Contents

  • 1 Attack
  • 2 Strength
  • 3 Defence
  • 4 Prayer
  • 5 Ranged
  • 6 Magic
  • 7 Hitpoints
